pr_title: Hide setting HDFS user/group behind a toggle

timeline.message:
Hide setting HDFS user/group behind a toggle

It is not uncommon for this operation to fail, flooding logs.
Make it non-default behavior.

timeline.bodyText: this is HDFS specific. Should it be noted in property name?

replies.bodyText: I guess not looking at other config properties here.
